content.question: Which of the following triggered the collapse of the Soviet Union in 1991 ?

choices.label: Subversion by the United States and its European allies
The failure of a hardline coup and Boris Yeltsin’s subsequent challenge to Mikhail Gorbachev’s leadership
The resistance of Soviet leaders such as Mikhail Gorbachev to necessary reforms of the Soviet system
The failure of the Soviet Union to modernize its military forces and its intelligence apparatus
The political alliance of Mikhail Gorbachev and Andrei Sakharov

content.answer: The failure of a hardline coup and Boris Yeltsin’s subsequent challenge to Mikhail Gorbachev’s leadership

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
